home.title: TG MiniApp Example
home.description: This is a simple repository that can be used as a starting point for your project. The template is based on VueJs. It also includes a UI library and an icon pack. For convenience, this template uses PocketBase as a Go backend. To communicate with the Telegram API, the PyTelegramBotApi library is used.
home.hint: To check the API status, you can open the settings tab via the dock button or by clicking the button.

need_auth.title: Not in Telegram
need_auth.hint: Please open this app inside the Telegram Mini App.

not_found.hint: The page you are trying to access does not exist.

popup.text: Please update the app by clicking here!
